tool_description: Enhance the effectiveness of your WhatsApp Marketing by utilizing our API to validate WhatsApp numbers in bulk validation or single validation call.
name: WhatsApp Number Validators
title: WhatsApp Number Validators

api_list.name: Validate Single Number (via POST Request)
api_list.description: Verify whether a given number is registered on WhatsApp and determine if it belongs to WhatsApp Business. To obtain the status of a particular number, please provide the number along with the corresponding country code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whatsapp-number-validators.p.rapidapi.com/v1/validate/wa_id"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsapp-number-validators.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Bulk Validation
api_list.description: Verify up to 25 numbers in once call. For each number, verify whether this number is registered on WhatsApp and determine if it belongs to WhatsApp Business. To obtain the status of these numbers, please provide all numbers along with the corresponding country code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whatsapp-number-validators.p.rapidapi.com/v1/bulk_validate/wa_id"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsapp-number-validators.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Phone Number Validation (via POST Request)
api_list.description: You can utilize a phone number validator to verify the validity of a given number. In case the number is invalid, the validator will provide alternative valid phone numbers for different countries associated with the given number.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whatsapp-number-validators.p.rapidapi.com/v1/validate/phone"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsapp-number-validators.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
